gw.webservice.contactapi

Class NameMapperBase

  • gw.webservice.contactapi.NameMapperBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    _proxy_.gw.lang.reflect.gs.IGosuObject, NameMapper

    public class NameMapperBase
implements NameMapper, _proxy_.gw.lang.reflect.gs.IGosuObject
    Base class for mapping entity and typelist values between Guidwire applications for use in the ABContactAPI. The ABContactAPI XmlBackedInstance is expressed in terms of the datamodel for ContactManager. Other applications need to translate their entity and typelist values from the application datamodel to the ContactManager datamodel (XSD). This class will have concrete subclasses for each application which specify the files used to map the names between the datamodels.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getABEntityName(String localEntityName)
      Translates an entity name from the local application namespace to the XSD (ContactManager) namespace
      String getABTypeCodeValue(String localTypeList, String localTypeCode)
      Translates a type code for a type list from the local application namespace to the XSD (ContactManager) namespace
      String getABTypeListName(String localTypeListName)
      Translates a type list name from the local application namespace to the XSD (ContactManager) namespace
      List<String> getAlternateABEntityNames(String localEntityName)
      Returns a list of alternate AB contact type names (Strings) associated with a given entity. 'Alternates' occur when multiple AB types map to a single local type. Each local type maps back to a single AB type. If the local type doesn't map back to the original AB type, then it's an alternate. For example, both ABPerson and ABPolicyPerson types in AB are mapped to Person in CC. Person in CC is mapped to ABPerson in AB, so ABPolicyPerson is an alternate contact type.
      List<String> getAlternateABTypeCodeValues(String entityName)

      • getAlternateABEntityNames

        List<String> getAlternateABEntityNames(String localEntityName)
        Returns a list of alternate AB contact type names (Strings) associated with a given entity. 'Alternates' occur when multiple AB types map to a single local type. Each local type maps back to a single AB type. If the local type doesn't map back to the original AB type, then it's an alternate. For example, both ABPerson and ABPolicyPerson types in AB are mapped to Person in CC. Person in CC is mapped to ABPerson in AB, so ABPolicyPerson is an alternate contact type.
        Parameters:
        localEntityName - the name of the local application entity
        Returns:
        the list of alternate AB contact types
